<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Powder Punch Stance](/Feats.aspx?ID=3575) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Outlaws of Alkenstar</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Stance" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=152" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg](/Sources.aspx?ID=119) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Martial Artist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=67)

**Prerequisites**
[Martial Artist Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2018)

**Access**
You're from Alkenstar or the Mana Wastes.

</column>

---

You infuse your handwraps with [black powder](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1190). On your first melee Strike each round with an [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attack, [knuckle duster](/Weapons.aspx?ID=185), or [black powder knuckle duster](/Weapons.aspx?ID=214), you deal an additional 1 fire damage. If you critically succeed at an attempt to [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=38) while in this stance, the target is pushed back an additional 5 feet.

<title level="2">Powder Punch Stance leads to...</title>
[Black Powder Flash](/Feats.aspx?ID=3572), [Thunder Clap](/Feats.aspx?ID=3576)

<title level="2">Black Powder Feats</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg](/Sources.aspx?ID=119) pg. 55</row>

If the characters agree to Nixbrix's challenge to defeat Bitey or otherwise impress the gang leader, he offers to teach them a few tricks. The characters gain access to the feats in the Black-Powder Berserkers section on page 79, even if they aren't from Alkenstar or the Mana Wastes, though they still must meet the feats' other prerequisites to take them.

**Related Feats**: [Black Powder Flash](/Feats.aspx?ID=3572), [Inured to Alchemy](/Feats.aspx?ID=3573), [Pain Tolerance](/Feats.aspx?ID=3574), [Thunder Clap](/Feats.aspx?ID=3576)
